results.content: Hitesh is a great teacher and seems to have genuine excitement over the coding and what he will be teaching us. I cannot recommend him enough.

results.content: He is not explaining anything. He just start coding himself and will not even explain why he wrote a line the way he wrote it and what is its significance. For example in Context API lecture 29, He said almost 3 times that we are going to learn what is context API but he never explain or gave answer to this question. he directly move how to create context API
